title: Damunt un cel de fil
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Spanish
description: A vegetarian peculiar in which healthy eating is implicit in its entire range. The lunch menu includes a starter salad buffet with fruit, vegetable, legumes, nuts or hummus; plus a second plate with potato, rice, cereal, or vegetable (changes daily). Pleasant surroundings under the roof of a historic building Muncunill Lluí­s. Tea room in the afternoon. Has Wi-Fi.
